name: Speak with Celara
summary: Check in with Celara at the tavern.
details: Celara wants an update from your adventures. Speak with her to complete this quest.

name: Train with the Practice Dummy
summary: Test your skills against the guild's training dummy.
details: Roll a d20 to see how well you perform in training.

name: Visit the Tavern
summary: Drop by the Tavern and check in.
details: The guild wants to see members active in the hall. Visit the Tavern and check in.

name: Gather Rumors for the Board
summary: Pick up rumors in the tavern and turn them in at the quest board.
details: Spend some time listening to chatter in the tavern, then report what youâ€™ve gathered to the guild quest board.
